about_the_game:
Each specific element of user-created content in GT:VR has specific tags assigned to them, allowing you to hide the things you don't wish to see.
You can select or deselect tags in the game's settings to ensure you only see the content you're comfortable with.

Tags that fall into the "Mature Content" category are disabled by default and the "Enable Mature Content" option is locked behind this DLC for the safety of our users. Purchasing this DLC will unlock the "Enable Mature Content" option in the game's settings.

content_descriptors.notes:
GT:VR contains user created avatars and worlds, and as such the content will vary. User-created content may contain nudity, gore or other mature themes. 

User-created content in GT:VR is displayed on an opt-in menu in-game. All mature content is disabled by default. 

The option to allow mature content only become available if the "GT:VR Mature Content" DLC is installed.
